sources.title: Law of the Sea (1931) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: William Farnum, Sally Blane, Wally Albright 
Director: Otto Brower

A sadistic, evil ship captain lusts after a beautiful young girl he spots in town. It turns out that she's the girlfriend of a young man whose father the captain had blinded and cast adrift on the ocean many years before!

metadata.Plot: A sadistic, evil ship captain lusts after a beautiful young girl he spots in town. It turns out that she's the girlfriend of a young man whose father the captain had blinded and cast adrift on the ocean many years before.
metadata.Actors: William Farnum, Sally Blane, Rex Bell
